body_html:
@li-roy I am currently using 0.4.1. I was trying the code from this repo:
https://github.com/wiseodd/controlled-text-generation

If you first run python train_vae.py --save --gpu and then python train_discriminator --save --gpu, you get this error message as well.
If you discard the --gpu option, the train_discriminator script runs fine.

body:
@li-roy I am currently using 0.4.1. I was trying the code from this repo:
https://github.com/wiseodd/controlled-text-generation

If you first run python train_vae.py --save --gpu and then python train_discriminator --save --gpu, you get this error message as well.
If you discard the --gpu option, the train_discriminator script runs fine.
